author: Bheks
comment:
To point out this isn‚Äôt the first we‚Äôve had drama with a streamer getting an account banned.

I think it was a couple years ago, before lighthouse and when reserve was filled with loot. Tweak got merked by a player who was ‚Äúteleporting‚Äù. The player was promptly banned.

The player was a small streamer/YTer (I don‚Äôt remember) who fortunately had a full recording of his POV and his end looked normal. So it was concluded that it was desync. Tweak ended up pleading for players case to BSG. So a much better outcome than what recently happened.

On a side note: I‚Äôve been thinking about a most likely rare but possible scenario. Say there‚Äôs a cheater and they spam Player A in the head but the rounds don‚Äôt pen or just don‚Äôt kill them. A third non-cheating player B sees sees the fight and takes a shot at player A and it kills them. What‚Äôs player A gonna do? Report player B because it‚Äôs obvious that the way they died was a result of cheating. 

Obviously I‚Äôll say, once again, that this is incredibly rare but possible. But taking a step back it seems like BSG have a game where even they can‚Äôt reliably ban actual cheaters vs. innocent players. 

The reality is that this game wasn‚Äôt built with cheaters in mind. The server sends all raid info to every client making radar hard to detect when ran through a second PC. Items being hard to acquire means the door has been opened for a lucrative black market. And now we‚Äôve a dev team that won‚Äôt manual ban if a regular player provides concrete evidence but will do manual bans if a streamer sends a DM with no concrete evidence. It‚Äôs at the point where we‚Äôve seen ‚Äúwhite hat‚Äù cheaters who go around killing other cheaters so the lobbies are safe for regular players.

I‚Äôve been playing the game for years on NA East. A region that‚Äôs typically the safest from cheaters. I can can‚Äôt on one hand how many times I‚Äôve encountered a definite cheater. But now my concern what happens if I‚Äôm accused? What happens if I kill Landmark, Rengawr, Pest or Jesse? On top of spending $150 on EOD, do I now need to spend $100-$150 on 6TB HDD and record every raid? And just deal with the performance hit when I play Tarky.

And even with that setup it‚Äôs no guarantee that if I‚Äôm falsely banned I‚Äôll get my account back. So then do I need hope and pray that I can make a big enough stink about it on Reddit and hope that the mods don‚Äôt take down my post? Right now I don‚Äôt want to play the game. I enjoy the game but I don‚Äôt want to risk being out the money. And I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only one.

Edit: Tweak got banned. Other player showed their VOD to BSG. Tweak was quickly unbanned.
